text: Anndee misal nguurndam aduna ɗam, ko wano ndiyam ɗam Men jippini immorde ka kammu, puɗi leydi ndin jillondira e majjam ɗum ko yimɓe e neemoraaɗi ñaamata. Haa si ndi leydi ndi ƴettii cuɗaari mayri ndi cuɗike, yimɓe mayri ɓen jikka wonnde ko ɓe hattamɓe (soñugol) e mayri, yami- roore Amen ardira e mayri jemma maa ñalorma, Men waɗa (puɗi) ɗin soñaaɗi wa si tawii ɗi moƴ- ƴaano hanki mun. Ko wano nii Men fensitirta Aayeeje ɗen wonannde yimɓe miijitotooɓe ɓen
